id.description: A unique identifier for the navigation

internal name.description: Internal instance name for the navigation

navigationType.description: Specifies the type of navigation such left, right, top, etc

singleColumn.description: Specifies if the menu has a single column only such as for left and top navigation

menuGroups.description: An array of groups of menu included in the navigation

enabled.description: Specifies if the navigation is enabled
